ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup cold milk, or more as needed
1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free pistachio pudding mix
1 cup frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed

cookingTips: Use softened cream cheese at room temperature for smooth consistency
Add milk gradually to achieve spreadable texture
Fold in whipped topping last to keep frosting light and airy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user achieve the right consistency for frosting and advise on proper folding technique.
